author: Zeke Turner
title: Bertelsmann Exploring Sale of Struggling Customer Services Unit
text:
BERLIN—German media giant Bertelsmann SE on Wednesday announced it is seeking to unload one of its largest businesses which has struggled to grow in a full or partial sale.
The customer relations management business, which runs call centers and handles customer services for clients that include Facebook Inc. and is now on the block, employs about 36,000 people, or about 22% of Bertelsmann’s total workforce, and has struggled to grow because of high startup costs and a drop-off in key accounts, according to Bertelsmann Chief...
